mapper.select: SELECT WORKSPACE_CD as workspaceCd, WORKSPACE_NM as workspaceNm, WORKSPACE_IMG as workspaceImg, INVITE_CD as inviteCd, ACTIVE_STATE as activeState, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, END_DATE as endDate FROM WORKSPACE WHERE LOWER(INVITE_CD) = LOWER(#{inviteCd})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVITATIONS WHERE WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd} AND INVITED_USER_ID = #{invitedUserId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INVITATIONS (WORKSPACE_CD, INVITED_USER_ID, INVITE_CD, STATUS) VALUES (#{workspaceCd}, #{invitedUserId}, #{inviteCd}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT i.WORKSPACE_CD, i.INVITED_USER_ID, u.USER_NM, u.USER_IMG, i.CREATED_DATE FROM INVITATIONS i JOIN USERS u ON i.INVITED_USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE i.WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd} AND i.STATUS IS NULL

SELECT i.WORKSPACE_CD, i.INVITED_USER_ID, u.USER_NM, u.USER_IMG, i.CREATED_DATE, w.WORKSPACE_NM FROM INVITATIONS i JOIN USERS u ON i.INVITED_USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN WORKSPACE w ON i.WORKSPACE_CD = w.WORKSPACE_CD WHERE i.STATUS IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKSPACE_MEMBERS ( WORKSPACE_CD, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, USER_ROLE, STATUS_MSG, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, ACTIVE_STATE, JOINED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{workspaceCd}, #{userId}, '', 'MEMBER', '', '', '', '1', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT WORKSPACE_CD AS workspaceCd, WORKSPACE_NM AS workspaceNm, WORKSPACE_IMG AS workspaceImg, INVITE_CD AS inviteCd, ACTIVE_STATE AS activeState, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, END_DATE AS endDate FROM WORKSPACE WHERE WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKSPACE_DEPT (WORKSPACE_CD, DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM) VALUES (#{workspaceCd}, #{deptCd}, #{deptNm})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(DEPT_CD, 2) AS UNSIGNED)) FROM WORKSPACE_DEPT
SELECT WORKSPACE_CD AS workspaceCd, DEPT_CD AS deptCd, DEPT_NM AS deptNm FROM WORKSPACE_DEPT WHERE WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd}

SELECT w.WORKSPACE_CD, w.WORKSPACE_NM, w.WORKSPACE_IMG, w.INVITE_CD, w.ACTIVE_STATE, w.CREATED_DATE, w.END_DATE, wm.FAVORITE, wm.ENTRANCE_DATE FROM WORKSPACE w JOIN WORKSPACE_MEMBERS wm ON w.WORKSPACE_CD = wm.WORKSPACE_CD WHERE wm.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY wm.FAVORITE DESC, wm.ENTRANCE_DATE DESC

SELECT w.WORKSPACE_CD AS workspaceCd, w.WORKSPACE_NM AS workspaceNm, w.WORKSPACE_IMG AS workspaceImg, w.INVITE_CD AS inviteCd, w.ACTIVE_STATE AS activeState, w.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, w.END_DATE AS endDate, CASE WHEN wm.FAVORITE = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN wm.FAVORITE = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS favorite, wm.ENTRANCE_DATE AS entranceDate FROM WORKSPACE_MEMBERS wm JOIN WORKSPACE w ON wm.WORKSPACE_CD = w.WORKSPACE_CD WHERE wm.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY favorite DESC, wm.ENTRANCE_DATE DESC

SELECT wm.USER_ID AS userId, wm.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, wm.STATUS_MSG AS statusMsg, wm.USER_IMG AS userImg, wm.USER_STATE AS userState, wm.DEPT_CD AS deptCd, d.DEPT_NM AS deptNm, wm.POSITION AS position, wm.EMAIL AS email, wm.PHONE_NUM AS phoneNum, wm.JOINED_DATE AS joinedDate FROM WORKSPACE_MEMBERS wm LEFT JOIN WORKSPACE_DEPT d ON wm.DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD WHERE wm.WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd}

SELECT WORKSPACE_CD AS workspaceCd, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, STATUS_MSG AS statusMsg, DEPT_CD AS deptCd, POSITION AS position, EMAIL AS email, PHONE_NUM AS phoneNum, JOINED_DATE AS joinedDate FROM WORKSPACE_MEMBERS WHERE WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
